SELECT a.sku_id skuId,a.sku_name skuName,b.price skuPrice,b.current_qty stockNum,b.vendibility fixedStatus,a.shop_categories shopCategories FROM product_jd a INNER JOIN product_status b ON b.sku_id=a.sku_id AND b.station_no = #{belongStationNo} AND b.vendibility=0 WHERE a.fixed_status = 1
AND a.sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{q},'%')

SELECT a.sku_id skuId,a.name `name`,a.price price,a.current_qty num,a.vendibility `status`
LIMIT #{pageStart,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.sku_id skuId,a.name `name`,a.price price,a.store_num num,a.is_sell `status`
LIMIT #{pageStart,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.sku_id skuId,a.sku_name skuName,a.sku_price skuPrice FROM product_jd a LEFT JOIN product_status b ON b.sku_id=a.sku_id AND b.station_no = #{stationNo} WHERE b.sku_id IS NULL AND a.fixed_status=1

SELECT sku_id skuId,sku_name skuName,sku_price skuPrice FROM product_jd WHERE fixed_status=1
AND sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{q},'%')
